<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ancestor's Rage](/Feats.aspx?ID=5607) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kholo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=758" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 19 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You transform into an enormous, otherworldly hyena. You can cast [_animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1440) (canine form only) once per day as a 5th-rank occult innate spell.
name: Ancestor's Rage
